class_description:
A wrapper for CertPathParameters. This class is used to pass validation
 settings to CertPath based TrustManagers using the
 TrustManagerFactory#init(ManagerFactoryParameters) method. Instances of this class are immutable.

Methods.method_description:
Construct new CertPathTrustManagerParameters from the specified
 parameters. The parameters are cloned to protect against subsequent
 modification.

return_description: a clone of the CertPathParameters encapsulated by this class.

Methods.method_description: Return a clone of the CertPathParameters encapsulated by this class.
